Title: Shoozla
Description:
Very simple and powerful application that helps you to find the cover for your mp3.
It searchs the images of your music files whitin LASTFM website (account needed) or PLAYME,com
All the images are saved into the mp3's ID3 tags!

The search algorithm tryies to find the exact cover in this order:
- ARTIST NAME + ALBUM NAME
- ARTIST NAME + SONG TITLE
- ARTIST NAME

You can also use the application from the command line, or create a scheduled task to search for covers periodically.

WPF Application developed in C# following a MVVM design pattern.

Very simple and powerful application that helps you to find the cover for your mp3.
It searchs the images of your music files whitin LASTFM website (account needed) or PLAYME,com
All the images are saved into the mp3's ID3 tags!

- ARTIST NAME + SONG TITLE

How does it work? see http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=50Vo8DXjyZE
